mapper.select: SELECT ORDB.ORD_NO AS ordNo /*주문번호*/ , ORDB.ORDR_ID AS ordrId /*주문자 아이디*/ , ORDB.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm /*주문자 이름*/ , ORDB.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon /*주문자 폰번호*/ , ORDB.PAY_MNY AS payMny /*결제금액*/ , ORDB.ORD_STAT AS ordStat /*주문상태코드*/ , ORDB.PAY_WAY AS payWay /*결제수단*/ , ORDB.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm /*수령자 이름*/ , ORDB.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon /*수령자 휴대폰*/ , ORDB.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr /*수령지 주소*/ , ORDB.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl /*수령지 상세 주소*/ , ORDB.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo /*배송메모*/ , ORDT.PROD_QTY AS prodQty /*수량*/ , ORDB.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , PROD.PROD_IMG AS prodImg /*이미지 경로*/ , PROD.PROD_IMG_DTL AS prodImgDtl /*이미지 이름*/ , PROD.PROD_PRICE AS prodPrice /*상품금액*/ , PROD.PROD_NAME AS prodName /*상품이름*/ FROM ORD_BASE ORDB INNER JOIN ORD_DTL ORDT ON ORDB.ORD_NO = ORDT.ORD_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT PROD ON ORDT.PROD_CODE = PROD.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ORDB.USR_ID = #{usrId} ORDER BY ORDB.ORD_NO DESC;

SELECT ORDB.ORD_NO AS ordNo /*주문번호*/ , ORDB.ORDR_ID AS ordrId /*주문자 아이디*/ , ORDB.ORDR_NM AS ordrNm /*주문자 이름*/ , ORDB.ORDR_PHON AS ordrPhon /*주문자 폰번호*/ , ORDB.PAY_MNY AS payMny /*결제금액*/ , ORDB.ORD_STAT AS ordStat /*주문상태코드*/ , ORDB.PAY_WAY AS payWay /*결제수단*/ , ORDB.ACQR_NM AS acqrNm /*수령자 이름*/ , ORDB.ACQR_PHON AS acqrPhon /*수령자 휴대폰*/ , ORDB.ACQR_ADDR AS acqrAddr /*수령지 주소*/ , ORDB.ACQR_ADDR_DTL AS acqrAddrDtl /*수령지 상세 주소*/ , ORDB.REQ_MEMO AS reqMemo /*배송메모*/ , ORDT.PROD_QTY AS prodQty /*수량*/ , ORDB.ORD_DATE AS ordDate , PROD.PROD_IMG AS prodImg /*이미지 경로*/ , PROD.PROD_IMG_DTL AS prodImgDtl /*이미지 이름*/ , PROD.PROD_PRICE AS prodPrice /*상품금액*/ , PROD.PROD_NAME AS prodName /*상품이름*/ FROM ORD_BASE ORDB INNER JOIN ORD_DTL ORDT ON ORDB.ORD_NO = ORDT.ORD_NO INNER JOIN PRODUCT PROD ON ORDT.PROD_CODE = PROD.PROD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ORDB.ORD_NO = #{ordNo}
